[User's Query End].
List of Tools with Names and Descriptions:
[List of Tools with Names and Descriptions Start]
1. tool name: tool_lens.email.e_mail__check__invalid.mail_check, tool description: Email, E-mail Check Invalid, mailCheck, ☑ Filter domain
☑ Not start with a special character and must begin with a letter, 
digit, or certain special characters like +, _, ., -.
☑ Followed by the @ symbol to separate the username part and the domain part of the email address.
☑ Domain part does not start or end with a dot or hyphen and only contains alphanumeric characters or dots.
☑ Email string ends after the domain part and there are no additional characters.
2. tool name: tool_lens.email.disposable__email__validation.validate_domain_or_email_address, tool description: Email, Disposable Email Validation, Validate domain or email address, Validate can either be a domain ( **spam4.me** ) or an email address ( **badactor@spam4.me** )
3. tool name: tool_lens.email.email_validator_v5.email, tool description: Email, Email validator_v5, Email, This API will validate email with domain name, it is use to filter out invalid email and invalid domain, to perfact match delivery rate and minimum email bounce
4. tool name: tool_lens.commerce.e_mail__check__invalid_or__disposable__domain_v2.mailcheck, tool description: Commerce, E-mail Check Invalid or Disposable Domain_v2, mailcheck, Check if e-mail domain is valid, or a disposable/temporary address. Invalid domains (typos, non-responding mailserver, etc) will return "valid: false","block: true". Disposable e-mail domains will return "valid: true" (since it's a valid domain), but "block: true" and "disposable: true".
5. tool name: tool_lens.email.emails__validator.verify__email, tool description: Email, Emails Validator, Verify Email, Allows validating email addresses. Checks if emails are deliverable.
6. tool name: tool_lens.email.fast__email_verifier.free_domain, tool description: Email, fast Email verifier, FreeDomain, Check whether or not you have a free domain.
7. tool name: tool_lens.email.disposable____invalid__email__verifier.email_verifier, tool description: Email, Disposable & Invalid Email Verifier, Email verifier, This endpoint verifies the validity of an email address. It checks the email address format, domain, and whether it is a disposable email address. It then extracts the MX records from the domain's DNS records and connects to the email server via SMTP. The function also simulates sending a message to the email server to confirm that the mailbox associated with the email address actually exists.
8. tool name: tool_lens.email.fast__email_verifier.email_verifications, tool description: Email, fast Email verifier, EmailVerifications, He is  a simple way  to verify a list of email addresses with different dimensions.
9. tool name: tool_lens.email.apimail10.current__mail, tool description: Email, apimail10, Current Mail, Current Mail
10. tool name: tool_lens.business.email_finder.fetch_email_of_a_person, tool description: Business, Email finder, Fetch email of a person, Get email of anyone in the internet. Best for lead generation, prospecting, and cold marketing.

[List of Tools with Names and Descriptions End]"
